```{sql connection=db}
select tip_amount, fare_amount, tip_amount*100/fare_amount as tip_percent
from yellow
where fare_amount is not null and tip_amount is not null
```
```{sql connection=db}
select tip_amount, fare_amount, sum(tip_amount*100/fare_amount)/ count(fare_amount) as mean_tip_percentage
from yellow
where fare_amount is not null and tip_amount is not null
```
